[[inst_hl_div]]
==== HL.DIV

*Syntax:* hl.div SrcL, SrcR, ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Divide registers. Unsigned variant for DIVU.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_div.svg[HL.DIV encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU_MULTI_CYCLE
